content:
I'd be happy to help you with that! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to set reminders or keep track of physical tasks. But I can certainly help you remember what you need to do.

Here's a summary of what you need to do:

* Order more of Luna's favorite grain-free wet food in blue packets (you have about a week's supply left)
* Wash Max's favorite squeaky toys with stuffing inside this weekend

You can set a reminder for yourself by using a digital calendar, reminder app, or even a sticky note on your fridge. Just make sure to set a specific date and time to order the food and wash the toys, so you don't forget!

If you need any further assistance or have any other questions, feel free to ask!
